description: Variation of conditions 1,3, 6, 8 of planning permission dated 19th July 2027 (RN 17/04068/FULL) for the erection of two storey side extension at lower ground and ground floor levels, erection of rear extension at lower ground floor level with roof terrace, platform and steps and installation of bin store in front garden. NAMELY, alterations have been implemented without the discharge of conditions; condition 1, the front wall has not been built in accordance with the approved plan. The variation we request is for the existing to be approved and retained; condition 3, stone samples were not submitted for approval and have been laid for the side for the side entrance steps. The variation we request is for the existing to be approved and retained; condition 8, landscaping was not submitted and approved. The hard landscaping has been carried but the soft landscaping remains; a plan is submitted with this application. The variation requested is that the hard landscaping be retained and approved and the attached soft landscaping scheme be approved.
